metadata.title: CVE-2019-7309 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: In the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) through 2.29, the memcmp functionfor the x32 architecture can incorrectly return zero (indicating that theinputs are equal) because the RDX most significant bit is mishandled.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
